basic.description: This course provides an overview of strategic planning as a framework for retail-firm analysis. Through the completion of retail-store business plans, students hone their leadership, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
basic.subject: CTE
basic.title: Retail Merchandising Planning Strategies

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: Senior standing, a 2.50 GPA, as well as a grade of "C" or better in CTE 3835, CTE 4822, and MAR 3023. Corequisites: CTE 4826 and CTE 4882.
